statements: SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1;
SELECT backup_name, backup_path FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT backup_name, backup_path, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_name LIKE 'daily%';
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_date, backup_path FROM backups WHERE backup_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_name, backup_date, backup_path, backup_id FROM backups WHERE backup_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_path FROM backups WHERE backup_path IS NOT NULL ORDER BY backup_name ASC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_name IN ('backup1', 'backup2', 'backup3') AND backup_date >= '2021-12-01' ORDER BY backup_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000;
SELECT backup_name, backup_size FROM backups WHERE backup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_name, backup_date, backup_size FROM backups JOIN backup_logs ON backups.id = backup_logs.backup_id ORDER BY backups.backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_size > 1000 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_size FROM backups WHERE backup_date > '2022-01-01' AND backup_size BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT b.backup_name, bl.log_message FROM backups b INNER JOIN backup_logs bl ON b.id = bl.backup_id WHERE bl.log_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY b.backup_name ASC, bl.log_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(backup_size) AS max_size, MIN(backup_size) AS min_size FROM backups;

SELECT b.backup_name, COUNT(bl.log_id) AS num_logs FROM backups b LEFT JOIN backup_logs bl ON b.id = bl.backup_id GROUP BY b.backup_name HAVING COUNT(bl.log_id) > 1 ORDER BY num_logs DESC, b.backup_name;
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_timestamp FROM backups ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_uri FROM backup_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT * FROM backup_schedule WHERE schedule_frequency > 1 ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_frequency FROM backup_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_id, backup_timestamp FROM backups ORDER BY backup_id DESC;
SELECT backup_name, location_name FROM backups b JOIN backup_locations l ON b.backup_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM backup_schedule WHERE schedule_frequency > 2 ORDER BY schedule_name ASC;
SELECT b.backup_id, b.backup_name, l.location_name FROM backups b LEFT JOIN backup_locations l ON b.backup_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM BackupSettings;
SELECT id, backup_location FROM BackupSettings ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT last_backup_date, backup_frequency FROM BackupSettings WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BackupLogs WHERE backup_status = 'Failed' ORDER BY backup_date ASC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_size FROM BackupHistory ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BackupSettings WHERE backup_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT backup_id, backup_date FROM BackupLogs ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_size FROM BackupHistory WHERE backup_size > 1000 ORDER BY backup_size DESC;
SELECT backup_id, error_description FROM BackupErrors WHERE error_code = 500 ORDER BY backup_id ASC;
SELECT id, backup_location FROM BackupSettings WHERE last_backup_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_backup_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_status = 'Completed';
SELECT backup_description, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_id = 2 AND backup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_schedule WHERE last_backup_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_status = 'success' ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_status = 'pending' AND backup_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY backup_date ASC;
SELECT backup_schedule.schedule_name, backup_configuration.backup_storage FROM backup_schedule JOIN backup_configuration ON backup_schedule.schedule_id = backup_configuration.config_id;

SELECT backup_logs.log_details, backups.backup_name, backup_users.email FROM backup_logs JOIN backups ON backup_logs.backup_id = backups.backup_id JOIN backup_users ON backups.backup_id = backup_users.user_id WHERE backup_logs.backup_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT backups.backup_name, backup_logs.log_details, backup_users.username, backup_users.access_level FROM backups LEFT JOIN backup_logs ON backups.backup_id = backup_logs.backup_id RIGHT JOIN backup_users ON backups.backup_id = backup_users.user_id WHERE backup_logs.log_id IS NULL;
